## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-2974">키프로스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2974">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-2975">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2976">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2977">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2978">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2979">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2980">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-2981">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-2982">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2982">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-2983">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-2984">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2984">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2985">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2985">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2986">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2986">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2987">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2987">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-2988">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-2989">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2989">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-2990">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-2991">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2991">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2992">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2992">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2993">시작  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2993">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-2994">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2994">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-2995">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-2995">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3023">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3023">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3024">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3025">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3025">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3026">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3027">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3027">eight letters and digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3028">'E' 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3028">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3029">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3029">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3030">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3030">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3031">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3032">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3033">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3033">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3034">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3035">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3035">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3036">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3036">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3037">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3037">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3163">체코 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3163">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3164">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3165">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3165">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3166">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3167">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3168">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3169">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3169">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3170">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3171">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3172">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3172">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3173">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3174">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3174">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3175">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3176">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3176">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3177">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3199">체코 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3199">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3200">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3201">선택적 슬래시(이전 형식)가 있는 9자리 숫자(선택적 슬래시(새 형식)가 있는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3201">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3202">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3203">9자리 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3203">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3204">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3204">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3205">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3205">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3206">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3206">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3207">10자리 숫자(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3207">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3208">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3208">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3209">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3209">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3210">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3210">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3211">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3212">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3213">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3214">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3215">이 Func_czech_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3215">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3216">검색된 Keyword_czech_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3216">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3217">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3218">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3219">이 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3219">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3221">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3221">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_czech_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3222">Keyword_czech_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3222">Keyword_czech_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3223">birth number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3223">birth number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3267">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3267">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3268">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3269">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3269">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3270">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3271">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3271">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3272">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3273">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3273">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3274">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3275">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3275">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3276">`Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3276">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3277">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3401">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3401">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3402">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3403">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3403">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3404">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3405">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3405">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3406">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3407">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3407">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3408">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3409">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3409">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3410">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3410">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3411">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3411">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3412">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 검색한 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3412">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3413">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3413">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3414">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3414">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3415">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3415">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3435">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3435">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3436">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3437">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3437">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3438">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3439">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3439">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3440">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3440">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3441">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3441">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3442">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3442">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3443">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3444">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3445">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3446">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3446">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3447">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3447">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3448">검색된 Keyword_denmark_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3448">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3449">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3449">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3450">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3450">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3451">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3451">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3452">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
    <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3524">DEA(마약 집행 기구) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3524">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3525">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3526">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3526">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3527">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3528">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3528">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3529">등록자 코드인 abcdefghjklmnprstux와 같은 가능한 문자 집합에서 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3529">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3530">한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )는 등록 기관의 성 또는 숫자 '9'의 첫 번째 문자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3530">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3531">7자리 숫자( 마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3531">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3532">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3533">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3533">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3534">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3535">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3535">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3536">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3536">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3537">키워드를 `Keyword_dea_number` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3537">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3538">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3539">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3540">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3540">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3541">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3541">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3542">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3542">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3544">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3544">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3545">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3545">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3546">마약 집행 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3546">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3547">마약 집행 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3547">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3548">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3548">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3549">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3550">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3550">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3551">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3552">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3552">two letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3553">문자 "ET"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3553">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3554">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3554">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3555">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3556">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3556">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3557">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3558">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3558">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3559">`Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3559">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3560">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3560">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3686">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3686">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-3687">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3687">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3688">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3688">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3689">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3689">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3690">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3690">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3691">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3691">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3692">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3692">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3693">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3694">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3694">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3695">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3696">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3696">11 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3697">성 및 생년월일(홀수 남성, 1-2세대, 19세, 3-4: 20 세기, 5-6: 21 세기)에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3697">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3698">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3698">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3699">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3699">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3700">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3700">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3701">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3702">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3702">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3703">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3704">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3705">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3705">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3706">시작  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3706">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3707">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3707">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3708">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3708">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3709">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3709">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3741">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3741">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3742">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3743">공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자를 입력하고 공백이나 따로 문자를 1개씩 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3743">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3744">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3745">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3745">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3746">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3747">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3747">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3748">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3749">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3749">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3750">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3750">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3751">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3751">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3752">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3752">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3753">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3754">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3754">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3755">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3773">유럽 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3773">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3774">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3775">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3775">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3776">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3777">복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3777">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3778">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3779">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3779">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-3780">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-3781">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3782">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3782">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3783">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3783">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88842-3784">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3784">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88842-3785">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3785">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88842-3786">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3786">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88842-3787">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88842-3788">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3788">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-3789">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-3789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4236">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4236">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4237">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4238">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4238">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4239">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4240">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4241">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4241">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4242">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4242">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4243">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4243">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4244">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4244">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4245">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4246">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4246">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4247">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4248">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4248">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4249">`Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4249">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4250">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4250">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4381">핀란드 유럽 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4381">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-4382">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4382">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4383">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4383">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4384">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4384">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4385">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4385">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4386">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4386">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4387">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4387">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4388">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4389">20자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4389">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4390">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4391">20자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4391">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4392">10자리 숫자 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4392">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4393">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4393">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4394">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4394">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4395">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4396">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4397">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4398">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4399">regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4399">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4400">검색된 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4400">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4418">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4418">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4419">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4420">6자리 숫자와 세 번째 숫자와 검사 숫자를 나타내는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4420">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4421">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4422">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4422">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4423">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4423">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4424">century 마커('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4424">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4425">3자리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4425">three-digit personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4426">검사 숫자인 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4426">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4427">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4428">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4428">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4429">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4430">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4430">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4431">함수가 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4431">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4432">검색된 Keyword_finnish_national_id 발견</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4432">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4433">체크 체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4433">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4434">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4434">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4435">함수가 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4435">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4436">체크 체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4436">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4485">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4485">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4486">이 엔터티는 EU Passport Number 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4486">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4487">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4487">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-4488">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4488">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4489">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4489">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-4490">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4490">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4491">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4491">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4492">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4492">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4493">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4494">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4495">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4496">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4496">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4497">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4497">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4498">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4498">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4499">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4499">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4500">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4501">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4501">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4502">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4502">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4526">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4526">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4527">이 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4527">This entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4528">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4529">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4529">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4530">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4531">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4531">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4532">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4533">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4533">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4534">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4535">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4535">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4536">함수가 Func_french_drivers_license 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4536">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4537">검색된 Keyword_french_drivers_license 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4537">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4664">프랑스 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4664">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-4665">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4665">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4666">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4666">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4667">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4667">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4668">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4668">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4669">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4669">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4670">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4670">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4671">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4671">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4672">21자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4672">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4673">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4673">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4674">21자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4674">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4675">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4675">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4676">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4676">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4677">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4678">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4679">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4679">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4680">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4681">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4682">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4683">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4683">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4684">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4684">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4685">검색된 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4685">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4686">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4686">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4688">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4688">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4689">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4689">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4690">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4690">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4691">프랑스 국가 ID 카드(CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4691">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4692">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4693">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4693">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4694">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4695">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4696">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4697">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4699">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4699">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4700">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4700">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4701">검색된 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4701">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4702">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4702">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4707">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4707">cni#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4711">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4711">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4712">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4712">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4713">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4713">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4714">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4714">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>


## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4715">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4715">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-4716">이 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4716">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88842-4717">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4717">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4718">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4719">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4719">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4720">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4721">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4721">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4722">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4722">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4723">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4723">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4724">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4724">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4725">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4726">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4728">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4729">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4729">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4730">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4730">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4731">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4731">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4732">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4733">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4733">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4734">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4734">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
