## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4765">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4765">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4766">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4767">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4767">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4768">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4769">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4769">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4770">13자리 숫자, 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4770">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-4771">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4771">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4772">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4772">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4773">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4774">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4775">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4776">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4776">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4777">이 `Func_french_insee` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4777">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4778">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4778">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4779">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4780">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4780">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4781">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4781">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4782">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4782">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

no. d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-p133">no. d'identité</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-p134">
no. d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-p134">no. d'identite</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4813">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4813">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4814">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4815">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4815">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4816">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4817">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4817">13 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4818">0, 1, 2 또는 3이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4818">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4819">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4819">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4820">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4820">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4821">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4821">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4822">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4823">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4823">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4824">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4825">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4825">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4826">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4827">검사 숫자 3개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4827">Three check digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4828">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4831">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4831">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4832">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4832">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4833">시작  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4834">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4834">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4835">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4835">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4855">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4855">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-4856">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4856">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4857">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4857">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4858">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4858">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4859">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4859">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4860">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4860">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4861">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4861">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4862">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4863">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4863">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4864">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4865">영문자 13자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4866">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4866">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4867">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4867">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4868">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4868">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4869">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4869">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4870">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4870">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4871">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4872">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4873">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4874">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4874">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4875">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4875">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4876">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4876">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4877">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4877">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4878">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4878">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4879">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4879">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4880">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4880">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4881">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4881">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4882">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4882">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4884">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4884">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4885">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4885">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4888">부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4888">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4889">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4889">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4892">n° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4892">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4893">numéro de tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4893">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4894">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4894">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4895">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4895">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4896">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4896">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88842-4897">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4897">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4898">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4898">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4899">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4899">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4900">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4900">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4901">11자리 숫자 및 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 됨):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4901">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4902">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4902">a digit or letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4903">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4903">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4904">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4904">six digits or letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4905">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4905">a digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4906">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4906">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4907">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4908">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4908">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4909">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-4910">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4911">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4911">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4912">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4912">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4913">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4913">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4914">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4914">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-4915">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4915">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4916">ausstellungsdatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4916">ausstellungsdatum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4917">ausstellungsort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4917">ausstellungsort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4918">ausstellende behöde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4918">ausstellende behöde</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4919">ausstellende behorde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4919">ausstellende behorde</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-4920">ausstellende behoerde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-4920">ausstellende behoerde</span></span>

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5062">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5062">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5063">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5064">2010년 11월 1일: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5064">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5065">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5065">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5066">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5067">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5067">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5068">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5068">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5069">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5069">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5070">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5070">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5071">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5071">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5072">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5073">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5073">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5074">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5075">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5075">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5076">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5076">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5077">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5077">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5078">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5078">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5079">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5079">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5080">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5080">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5081">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5081">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5082">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5082">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5083">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5083">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5084">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5084">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5085">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5085">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5086">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5086">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5087">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5087">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5088">personal id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5088">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5089">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5089">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5090">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5090">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5091">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5091">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5092">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5092">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5093">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5093">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5094">이 엔터티는 EU Passport Number 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5094">This entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5095">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5096">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5096">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5097">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5098">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5098">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5099">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5099">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5100">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5100">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5101">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5101">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5102">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5102">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5103">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5104">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5104">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5105">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5106">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5106">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5107">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5107">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5108">키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5108">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5109">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5109">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5110">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5111">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5111">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5112">키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5112">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5113">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5113">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5115">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5115">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5125">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5125">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5126">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5126">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5127">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5127">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5128">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5128">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5136">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5136">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5137">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5138">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5138">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5139">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5140">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5140">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5141">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5141">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5142">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5142">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5143">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5143">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5144">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5145">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5145">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5146">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5147">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5147">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5148">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5148">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5149">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5150">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5150">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5151">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5152">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5153">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5153">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5154">시작  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5154">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5155">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5155">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5156">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5156">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5157">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5157">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5158">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5158">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5159">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5159">identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5160">steuer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5160">steuer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5161">steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5161">steueridentifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5162">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5162">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5163">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5163">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5164">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5164">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5182">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5182">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-5183">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5183">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5184">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5184">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5185">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5185">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5186">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5186">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5187">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5187">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5188">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5188">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5189">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5190">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5190">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5191">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5192">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5192">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5193">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5193">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5194">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5194">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5195">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5195">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5196">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5196">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5197">선택적 공백 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5197">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5198">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5199">선택적 공백 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5200">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5200">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5201">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5202">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5203">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5204">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5205">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5205">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5206">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5206">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5207">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5208">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5208">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5218">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5218">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5219">이 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5219">This entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88842-5220">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5220">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5221">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5222">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5222">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5223">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5224">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5224">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5225">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5225">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5226">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5226">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5227">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5227">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5228">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5228">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5229">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5229">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5230">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5230">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5356">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5356">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5357">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5358">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5358">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5360">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5360">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5361">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5361">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5362">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5362">A dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5363">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5363">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5364">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5364">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5365">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5365">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5366">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5366">A dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5367">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5367">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5368">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5369">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5369">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5370">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5371">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5372">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5372">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5373">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5373">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5374">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5374">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5375">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5375">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5376">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5378">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5378">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5379">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5379">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5380">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5380">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5381">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5381">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5382">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5382">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5383">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5383">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5384">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5384">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5385">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5385">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5386">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5386">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5387">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5388">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자(공백이나 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5388">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5390">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5390">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5391">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5392">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5392">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5393">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5394">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5395">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5395">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5396">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5397">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM YY(예 - 28 8월 19일) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5397">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5398">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5399">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5399">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5400">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5417">그리스 AMKA(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5417">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-5418">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5419">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5420">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5421">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5422">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5423">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5424">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5425">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5425">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5426">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5426">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5427">YYMMDD 생년월일로 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5427">Six digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5428">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5428">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5429">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5429">a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5430">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5431">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5431">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5432">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5433">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5433">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5434">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5434">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5435">시작  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5435">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5436">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5437">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5437">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5448">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5448">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-5449">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5449">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5450">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5450">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5451">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5451">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5452">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5452">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5453">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5453">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5454">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5454">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5455">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5456">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5456">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5458">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5458">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5459">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5460">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5460">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5461">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5462">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5463">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5463">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5464">시작  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5464">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5493">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5493">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5494">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5495">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5495">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5496">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5497">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5497">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5498">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5498">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5499">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5499">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5500">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5500">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5501">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5502">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5502">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5503">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5504">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5504">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5505">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5505">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5506">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5506">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5507">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5507">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5508">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5509">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5509">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5510">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5510">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5550">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5550">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5551">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5552">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5552">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5553">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5554">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5554">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5555">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5555">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5556">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5556">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5557">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5558">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5558">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5559">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5560">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5561">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5561">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5562">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5687">헝가리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5687">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-5688">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5689">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5690">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5691">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5692">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5693">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5694">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5695">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5695">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5696">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5697">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5697">11 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5698">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자, 남성 1명, 여성 2명입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5698">One digit that corresponds to gender, 1 for male, 2 for female.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88842-5699">1900년 이전의 시민이나 시민권이 2배인 시민에 대해 다른 번호가 가능합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5699">Other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5700">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5701">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5702">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5702">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5703">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5704">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5704">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5705">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5706">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5707">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5708">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5709">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5710">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5711">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5711">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5713">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5713">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5714">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5714">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5715">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5715">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5716">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5716">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88842-5717">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5717">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5718">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5718">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5719">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5719">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5720">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5720">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5721">헝가리 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5722">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5723">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자(공백이나 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5724">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5725">2개의 문자와 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5726">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5727">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5727">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-5728">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5729">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5730">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5731">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5732">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-5733">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5734">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-5735">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
