## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6586">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6586">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6587">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6588">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6588">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6589">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6590">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6590">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6591">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6591">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6592">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6592">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6593">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6594">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6594">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6595">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6596">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6596">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6597">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6597">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6598">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6598">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6599">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6599">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6600">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6601">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6601">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6602">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6603">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6603">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6604">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6604">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6626">이탈리아 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6626">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-6627">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6627">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6628">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6628">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6629">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6629">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6630">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6630">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6631">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6631">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6632">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6632">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6633">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6634">선택적 소수점 문자가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6634">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6635">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6636">선택적 delimiters가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6636">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6637">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6637">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6638">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6638">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6639">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6639">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6640">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6640">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6641">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6642">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6643">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6644">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6644">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6645">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6645">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6646">검색된 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6646">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6647">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6647">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6648">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6648">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6656">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6656">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6657">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6658">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6658">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6659">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6660">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6660">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6661">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6661">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6662">bank account branch code:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6662">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6663">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6664">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6664">a space or dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6665">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6665">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6666">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6667">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6667">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6668">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6669">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6669">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6670">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6670">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6671">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6671">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6672">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6672">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6673">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6673">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6674">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6675">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6676">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6676">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6677">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6677">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6724">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6724">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6725">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6726">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6726">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6727">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6728">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6728">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6729">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6730">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6730">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6731">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6732">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6733">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6733">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6734">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6734">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6772">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6772">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-6773">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6773">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6774">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6774">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6775">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6775">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6776">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6776">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6777">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6777">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6778">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6778">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6779">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6780">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6780">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6781">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6782">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6782">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6783">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6783">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6784">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6784">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6785">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6786">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6786">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6787">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6788">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6789">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6789">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6790">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6790">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6791">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6791">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6792">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6792">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6807">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6808">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6809">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6810">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6811">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6812">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6813">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6813">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6814">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6815">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6815">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6816">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6816">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6817">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6817">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6818">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6818">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6819">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6819">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6820">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6820">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6821">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6822">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6823">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6824">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6825">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6825">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6826">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6826">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6827">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6827">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6828">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6828">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6833">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6833">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6834">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6834">共通番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6841">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6841">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6842">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6843">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6843">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6844">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6845">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6845">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6846">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6847">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6848">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6849">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6850">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6850">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6851">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6851">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6852">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6852">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6853">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6853">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6854">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6854">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6855">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6855">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6856">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6856">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6857">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6857">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6858">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6858">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6859">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6859">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6860">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6860">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6861">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6861">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6862">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6862">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6863">ストトトNo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6863">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6864">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6864">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6865">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6865">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6866">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6866">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6867">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6867">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6868">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6868">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6869">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6870">문자 및 숫자 12개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6870">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6871">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6872">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6872">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6873">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6873">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6874">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6874">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6875">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6875">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6876">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6877">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6878">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6879">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6880">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6880">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6881">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6882">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6882">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6884">거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6884">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6885">거주 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6885">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6886">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6886">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6887">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6887">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6888">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6888">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6889">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6889">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6890">일본 거주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6890">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6891">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6892">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6892">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6893">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6893">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6894">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6894">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6895">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6896">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6896">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6897">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6898">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6898">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6899">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6899">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6900">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6900">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6901">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6901">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6902">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6902">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6903">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6903">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6904">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6904">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6905">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6905">Resident Registration No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6906">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6906">Resident Register No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6907">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6907">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6908">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6908">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6909">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6909">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6910">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6910">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6911">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6911">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6912">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6912">外国人登録証</span></span>


## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6913">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6913">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6914">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6915">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6915">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6917">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6917">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6918">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6918">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6919">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6919">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6920">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6920">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6921">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6921">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6922">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6923">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6924">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6925">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6926">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6926">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6927">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6927">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6928">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6929">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6929">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6930">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6930">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6951">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6951">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6952">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6953">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6953">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6954">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6955">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6955">three letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6956">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6956">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6957">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6957">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6958">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6959">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6959">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-6960">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-6961">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6961">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6962">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6962">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-6963">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-6963">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7088">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7088">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7089">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7090">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7090">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7091">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7091">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7092">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7092">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7093">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7093">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7094">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7094">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7095">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7096">생년월일(19번째 19번째 10년의 경우 "1", 21세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7096">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7097">4자리 숫자( 임의로 생성)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7097">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7098">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7098">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7099">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7099">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7100">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7100">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7101">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7101">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7102">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7103">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7103">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7104">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7105">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7105">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7106">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7106">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7107">시작  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7107">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7108">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7108">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7109">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7109">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7172">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7172">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7173">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7174">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7174">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7175">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7176">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7176">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7177">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7177">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7178">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7178">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7179">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7180">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7181">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7182">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7182">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7183">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7183">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7184">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7184">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7185">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7185">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7186">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7187">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7187">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7188">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7188">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7211">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7211">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7212">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7213">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7213">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7214">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7215">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7215">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7216">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7217">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7217">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7218">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7219">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7219">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7220">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7220">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7221">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7221">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7346">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7346">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-7347">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7347">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7348">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7348">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7349">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7349">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7350">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7350">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7351">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7351">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7352">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7352">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7353">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7354">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7354">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7355">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7356">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7356">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7357">생년월일과 성별 및 세기에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1-6)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7357">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7358">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7358">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7359">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7359">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7360">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7360">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7361">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7362">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7364">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7365">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7365">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7366">시작  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7366">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7367">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7367">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7368">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7368">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7403">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7403">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7404">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7405">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7405">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7407">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7407">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7408">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7409">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7409">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7410">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7411">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7412">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7412">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7413">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7414">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7415">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7416">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7416">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7417">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7437">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7437">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7438">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7439">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7439">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7440">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7441">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7441">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7442">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7443">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7443">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7444">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7445">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7446">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7446">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7447">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7571">룩룩부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7571">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-7572">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7573">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7574">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7575">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7576">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7577">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7578">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7579">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7579">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7580">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7581">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7581">13 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7582">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7582">11 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7583">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7583">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7584">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7585">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7585">yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7587">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7588">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7588">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7589">시작  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7589">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7590">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7591">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7591">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7614">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7614">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7615">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7616">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7616">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7617">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7618">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7618">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7619">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7620">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-7621">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7622">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7623">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7623">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7624">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7624">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7625">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7625">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-7626">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7627">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7627">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-7628">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-7628">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
