## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8610">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8610">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8611">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8612">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8612">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8613">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8614">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8614">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8615">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8615">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8616">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8616">three-digit individual number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8617">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8617">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8618">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8619">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8619">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8620">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8621">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8621">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8622">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8622">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8623">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8623">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8624">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8624">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8625">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8625">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8626">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8626">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8627">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8627">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8636">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8636">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8637">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8638">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8638">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8639">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8640">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8640">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8641">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8641">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8642">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8642">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8643">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8643">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8644">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8644">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8645">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8645">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8646">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8647">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8648">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8649">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8650">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8650">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8651">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8651">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8652">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8652">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8655">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8655">UMID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8656">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8656">Identity Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8658">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8658">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8659">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8660">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8660">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8661">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8662">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8662">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8663">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8663">five digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8664">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8664">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8665">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8666">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8666">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8667">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8667">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8668">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8669">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8671">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8672">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8672">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8673">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8797">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8797">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8798">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8799">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8799">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8800">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8801">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8801">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8802">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8803">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8804">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8805">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8806">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8806">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8807">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8807">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8808">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8809">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8811">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8811">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8816">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8816">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-p145">dow. os.
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-p145">dow. os.</span></span>


## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8819">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8819">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8820">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8821">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8821">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8822">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8822">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8823">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8823">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8824">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8824">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8825">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8825">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8826">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8827">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8827">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8828">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8829">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8829">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8830">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8830">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8831">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8831">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8832">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8833">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8834">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8834">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8835">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8836">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8836">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8841">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8841">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8842">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8842">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8843">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8843">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8844">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8844">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8847">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8847">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-8848">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8848">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88842-8849">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8849">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8850">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8851">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8851">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8852">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8853">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8853">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8854">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8855">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8856">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8857">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8857">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8858">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8858">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8859">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8859">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8860">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8860">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8861">시작 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8861">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8862">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8862">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8863">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8863">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8864">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8864">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8865">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8865">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8866">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8866">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8867">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8867">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8868">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8870">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8870">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8894">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8894">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-8895">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8895">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8896">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8896">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8897">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8897">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8898">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8898">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8899">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8899">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8900">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8900">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8901">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8902">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8902">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8903">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8903">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8904">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8904">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8905">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8905">nine digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8906">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8906">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8907">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8907">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8908">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8908">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8909">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8910">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8911">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8912">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8912">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8913">이 Func_polish_regon_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8913">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8914">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8914">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8915">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8915">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8916">이 Func_polish_regon_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8916">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8933">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8933">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-8934">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8934">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8935">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8935">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8936">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8936">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8937">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8937">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8938">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8938">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8939">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8939">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8940">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8941">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8941">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8942">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8943">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8943">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8944">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8945">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8947">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8948">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8948">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8949">시작  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8949">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8979">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8979">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8980">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8981">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8981">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8982">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8983">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8983">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8984">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8985">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8985">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-8986">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-8987">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8987">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8988">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8988">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-8989">검색된 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-8989">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9009">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9009">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9010">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9011">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9011">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9012">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9013">패턴 1: 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9013">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9014">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9014">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9015">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9015">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9016">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9016">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9017">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9017">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9018">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9018">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9019">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9019">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9020">1개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9020">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9021">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9021">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9022">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9022">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9023">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9023">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9024">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9024">One digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9025">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9026">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9026">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9027">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9028">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9028">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9029">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9029">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9030">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9162">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9162">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9163">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9164">공백이나 따로 6자리 숫자를 입력하고 공백이나 따로 문자를 1개씩 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9164">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9165">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9166">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9166">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9167">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9167">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9168">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9168">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9169">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9170">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9170">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9171">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9172">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9173">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9173">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9174">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9175">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9176">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9177">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9177">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9178">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9205">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9205">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9206">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9207">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9207">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9208">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9208">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9209">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9210">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9210">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9211">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9212">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9212">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9213">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9213">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9214">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9215">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9217">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9217">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9218">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9218">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9219">시작  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9219">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9220">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9220">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9221">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9221">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9246">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9246">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9247">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9248">문자 1개와 숫자 8자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9248">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9249">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9250">한 문자와 8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9250">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9251">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9251">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9252">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9252">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9253">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9254">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9254">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9255">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9256">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9256">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9257">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9257">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9258">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9258">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9386">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9386">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-9387">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9388">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9389">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9390">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9391">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9392">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9393">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9394">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9394">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9395">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9395">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9396">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9396">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9397">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9397">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9398">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9398">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9399">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9399">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9400">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9401">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9401">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9402">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9403">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9404">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9404">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9405">시작  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9405">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9406">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9406">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9407">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9407">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9458">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9458">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9459">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9460">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9460">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9461">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9462">8자리 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9462">eight or nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9463">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9464">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9464">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9465">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9466">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9466">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9467">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9467">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9468">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9468">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9469">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9469">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9470">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9470">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9471">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9471">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9472">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9472">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9490">러시아 여권 번호 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9490">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-9491">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9491">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9492">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9492">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9493">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9493">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9494">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9494">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9495">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9495">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9496">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9496">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9497">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9498">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9498">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9499">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9500">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9500">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9501">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9501">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9502">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9502">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9503">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9503">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9504">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9504">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9505">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9505">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9506">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9507">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9507">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9508">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9509">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9509">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9510">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9510">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9511">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9511">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9528">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9528">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-9529">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9529">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9530">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9530">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9531">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9531">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9532">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9532">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9533">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9533">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9534">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9534">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9535">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9536">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9536">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9537">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9538">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9538">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9539">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9539">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9540">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9540">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9541">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9541">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9542">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9543">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9543">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9544">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9545">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9545">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9546">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9546">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9547">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9547">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9564">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9564">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9565">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9566">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9566">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9567">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9568">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9568">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9569">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9570">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9571">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9572">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9572">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9573">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9573">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9574">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9574">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span>


## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9581">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9581">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9582">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9583">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9583">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9584">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9584">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9585">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9585">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9586">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9586">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9587">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9587">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9588">사전순 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9588">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9589">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9590">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9590">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9591">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9592">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9592">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9593">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9593">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9594">검색된 Keyword_singapore_nric 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9594">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9595">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9595">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9596">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9596">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9597">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9597">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9598">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9598">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9609">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9609">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9610">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9611">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9611">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9612">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9613">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9613">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9614">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9614">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9615">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9615">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9616">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9617">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9617">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9618">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9619">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9620">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9621">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9621">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9747">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9747">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-9748">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9748">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9749">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9749">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9750">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9750">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9751">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9751">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9752">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9752">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9753">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9753">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9754">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9755">선택적 백 슬래시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9755">nine or 10 digits containing optional backslash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9756">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9756">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9757">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9757">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9758">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9758">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9759">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9759">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9760">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9760">one optional check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9761">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9762">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9762">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9763">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9764">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9765">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9765">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9766">시작  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9767">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9768">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9768">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
