## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9815">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9815">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9816">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9817">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9817">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9818">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9819">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9819">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9820">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9821">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9821">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9822">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9823">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9823">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9824">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9824">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9825">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9826">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9826">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9827">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9828">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9828">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9829">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9829">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9851">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9851">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9852">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9853">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9853">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9854">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9855">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9855">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9856">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9857">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9857">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9858">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9859">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9859">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9860">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9860">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9861">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9861">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-9989">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9989">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9990">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9990">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9991">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9991">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9992">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9992">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9993">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9993">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9994">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9994">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9995">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9996">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9996">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-9997">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-9998">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9998">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-9999">"LLL"이 생년월일의 마지막 3자리에 해당하는 생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-9999">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10000">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10000">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10001">같은 날에 태어나는 사람의 성별과 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10001">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="88842-10002">남성의 경우 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10002">000-499 for male and 500-999 for female.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10003">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10003">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10004">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10005">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10005">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10007">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10007">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10008">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10008">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10009">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10010">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10010">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10011">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10011">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10039">솔로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10039">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10040">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10041">공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자를 입력할 때 공백이나 공백이 없는 문자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10041">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10042">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10042">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10043">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10043">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10044">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10044">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10045">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10045">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10046">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10046">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10047">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10048">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10049">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10050">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10051">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10051">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10052">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10053">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10053">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10054">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10055">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10055">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10056">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10079">솔로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10079">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-10080">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10080">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10081">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10081">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10082">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10082">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10083">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10083">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10084">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10084">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10085">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10085">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10086">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10087">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10087">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10088">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10088">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10089">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10089">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10090">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10091">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10091">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10092">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10093">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10093">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10094">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10095">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10096">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10096">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10097">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10098">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10099">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10099">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10105">tax file no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10105">tax file no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10112">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10112">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10113">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10113">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10114">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10114">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10115">일자 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10115">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10123">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10123">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10124">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10125">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10125">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10126">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10127">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10127">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10128">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10128">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10129">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10129">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10130">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10130">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10131">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10131">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10132">체크 um 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10132">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10133">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10134">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10135">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10136">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10137">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10137">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10138">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10138">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10139">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10140">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10140">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10142">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10142">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10143">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10143">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10144">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10144">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10145">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10146">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10147">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10147">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10148">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10149">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10149">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10150">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10150">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10151">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10151">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10152">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10152">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10153">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10153">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10154">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10154">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10155">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10155">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10156">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10157">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10157">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10159">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10159">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10160">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10160">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10161">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10161">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10162">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10162">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10163">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10163">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10164">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10164">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10165">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10166">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10166">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10168">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10168">National ID card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10169">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10169">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10171">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10171">RRN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10172">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10172">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10173">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10173">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10174">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10175">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10175">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10177">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10177">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10178">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10179">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10179">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10180">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10181">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10183">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10184">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10184">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10185">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10185">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10186">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10187">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10187">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10321">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10321">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-10322">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10322">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10323">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10323">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10324">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10324">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10325">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10325">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10326">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10326">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10327">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10327">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10328">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10329">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10329">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10330">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10331">7자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10331">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10332">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10332">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10333">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10333">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10334">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10335">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10336">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10338">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10339">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10339">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10340">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10340">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10341">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10341">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10342">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10342">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10366">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10366">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10367">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10368">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8자 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10368">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10369">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10370">8자 또는 9자 조합의 문자와 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10370">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10371">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10371">two digits or letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10372">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10372">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10373">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10373">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10374">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10375">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10375">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10376">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10377">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10377">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10378">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10378">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10379">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10379">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10380">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10380">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10381">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10382">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10382">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10383">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10383">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10412">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10413">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10414">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10416">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10417">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10417">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10418">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10419">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10420">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10421">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10422">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10423">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10424">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10425">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10426">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10427">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="88842-10428">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10429">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10430">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10431">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10432">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10432">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10434">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10434">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10435">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10435">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10436">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10436">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10437">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10437">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10438">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10438">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10439">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10439">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10440">스페인 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="88842-10441">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10442">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10443">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10444">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10445">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10446">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10447">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10448">지정된 패턴에서 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10450">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10451">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10451">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10452">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10453">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10454">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10455">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10456">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10457">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만의 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10458">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10459">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10459">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10460">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10462">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10463">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10464">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10466">"M"을(를) 구분하는 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10467">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10468">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10469">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10470">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10470">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10471">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10472">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10473">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10474">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10475">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10476">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10507">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10508">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10509">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10511">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10512">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10513">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd"에서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10514">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10515">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미코론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10516">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 인용 부호(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10517">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10518">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10519">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10520">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10521">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10522">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10523">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10524">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10525">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10526">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10526">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10528">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10528">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10529">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10529">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10530">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10530">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10531">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10531">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10533">이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10533">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10534">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10534">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10535">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10535">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88842-10536">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10536">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88842-10537">기호(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10537">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88842-10538">대/소문자, 숫자, 추가 문자(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자에 대한 1-200자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10538">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="88842-10539">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10539">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10541">이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10541">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10542">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10542">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10543">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10543">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10544">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10544">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10545">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10545">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10546">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10546">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10547">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10547">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10548">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10548">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10549">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10549">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="88842-10550">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10550">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10551">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10551">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="88842-10552">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10552">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10553">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10554">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10555">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10557">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10558">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10558">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10559">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10560">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10560">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10561">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10562">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10563">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10564">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10565">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10566">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10567">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10567">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10568">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10568">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10569">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10569">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10570">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10570">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10571">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10571">driverlicense</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10699">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10700">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10701">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10702">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10703">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10704">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10705">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10707">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10708">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10709">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10711">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10712">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10713">키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10714">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10715">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10716">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10717">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10736">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10737">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10738">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10739">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10740">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10741">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10742">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="88842-10743">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10744">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10745">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10746">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10747">`Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(01 JAN/JAN 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="88842-10748">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10749">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="88842-10750">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="88842-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
